name: Carine Moitier
goal:
Driving the expansion of ecommerce.

Provide ecommerce consultancy and expertize to the sector of the clothing and fashion industries and other industries as well, including digitalisation of the whole value chain (use of internet), fabrication, marketing and sales, order processing, supply chains and logistics, customization and made-to-measure, legal aspects and safety issues, circular economy.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Information Society, Internal Market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Strenghtening the European clothing and fashion industry through the use of the latest ecommerce and digitalization technologies and the set-up of local distributed fabrication facilities, green supply chains and c2c platforms (prosumers networks)
